title.text: A Syntactic Framework for Speech Repairs and Other Disruptions

abstractContent.text: This paper presents a grammatical and processing framework for handling the repairs, hesitations, and other interruptions in natural human dialog.

entities.text: handling the repairs, hesitations, and other interruptions in natural human dialog

abstractContent.text: The proposed framework has proved adequate fora collection of human-human task-oriented dialogs, both in a full manual examination of the corpus, and in tests with a parser capable of parsing some of that corpus.
This parser can also correct a pre-parser speech repair identifier resulting in a 4.8% increase in recall.
